connect.text: Download Tari Aurora and track your real-time tXTM balance anywhere. Get it now for iOS or Android.
connect.title: Track your tXTM balance on your phone

qrcode.text: Scan the QR code to sync your Universe wallet with Tari Aurora on your phone. When prompted, enter the security code below in Tari Aurora and follow the steps in the app.
qrcode.title: Sync Universe with Tari Aurora
qrcode.warning: Do not share this QR code
